data.title: Famous Authors from Israel
data.meta_description: List of the most popular authors from Israel, listed alphabetically with photos when available. For centuries authors have been among the world's most ...
data.text:
List of the most popular authors from Israel, listed alphabetically with photos when available. For centuries authors have been among the world's most important people, helping chronicle history and keep us entertained with one of the earliest forms of storytelling. Whether they're known for fiction, non-fiction, poetry or even technical writing, the famous Israeli authors on this list have kept that tradition alive by writing renowned works that have been praised around the world. You can find useful information below about these notable Israeli writers, such as when they were born and where their place of birth was.

List authors include Haim Ginott, Agi Mishol and many additional authors as well.

This list answers the questions, "Which famous authors are from Israel?" and "Who are the best Israeli authors?"

For further information on these historic Israeli authors, click on their names. If you're a bookworm then use this list of celebrated Israeli authors to discover some new books that you will enjoy reading.
